import React, { Component } from "react"; import propTypes from "prop-types"; import "../styles/App.css"; import "../styles/bootstrap.min.css"; class DetailProduk extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); } render() { return (

{this.props.nama}

Rp. {this.props.hargaAwal}

Rp. {this.props.hargaAkhir}

Some example text some example text.

Buy Rent

Nama Produk: {this.props.nama}

Harga: Rp. {this.props.hargaAwal}

Stock sisa:{this.props.stok}

Deskripsi lengkap:

{this.props.deskripsi}

Tanggal Publish: {this.props.tanggalPost}

); } } DetailProduk.propTypes = { nama : PropTypes.string, hargaAwal : PropTypes.number, hargaAkhir : PropTypes.number, stok : PropTypes.number, image : PropTypes.string, deskripsi : PropTypes.string, tanggalPost : PropTypes.string } export default DetailProduk;
